channel.title: Bringing back the RuneScape we loved
channel.description:
[img]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/6290/ehee.gif[/img]
[b]Hello everyone, and welcome to my thread. The reason why I started to work on this Project is because I really enjoyed playing old RuneScape and I know that I`m not the only that enjoyed like me. I played RuneScape since 2003-2004, I`ve been into a really lot of updates, I`ve seen a lot of shit being added on RuneScape which made RuneScape now shit. I`m working on this so that people can feel like the felt once on RuneScape.[/b]
[code] Updates(done in the Last 5 days ~15.08-20.08~): ___________________ Telekinetic Grab Fixed the Telekinetic Grab Dupe Started working on a Minigame called "The Mole" (30%) Fixed the Arrows Dupe Fixed the Blood Runes in bank Dupe Fixed the Teleporting Bug Added real GFX to Teleporting Added the sidebar interface Teleporting Added Talisman Locating Made caskets give you 100k, caskets show interface, and stuff. Fixed Restore Potions Added Transparent Menu`s Started working on Saradomin Brews(80%) Working on the Desert Treasure quest Added the Dragon BattleAxe special Fixed the 2H&Shield Dupe Added AutoCasting Added Herbs cleaning Added Gem Cutting Started Firemaking(95%) Started Fletching(5%)[/code]
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg59/scaled.php?server=59&filename=formoparfletch1.png&res=medium[/img] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg8/scaled.php?server=8&filename=fletching4unstrungcompb.png&res=medium[/img] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg37/scaled.php?server=37&filename=fletching2mopar.png&res=medium[/img] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg685/scaled.php?server=685&filename=geniuslamp.png&res=medium[/img] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg828/scaled.php?server=828&filename=eastereggw.png&res=medium[/img] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg12/scaled.php?server=12&filename=tutorialisland.png&res=medium[/img] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg641/scaled.php?server=641&filename=firemaking2.png&res=medium[/img] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg846/scaled.php?server=846&filename=flaxpickup.png&res=medium[/img] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg109/scaled.php?server=109&filename=smelt1.png&res=medium[/img] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg88/scaled.php?server=88&filename=depostbox.png&res=medium[/img] [img]http://a7.sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/262938_1944977387249_1326951647_31748044_2719382_n.jpg[/img] [img]http://a4.sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-snc7/294758_1944976707232_1326951647_31748042_4641291_n.jpg[/img] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg810/scaled.php?server=810&filename=barrowsc.png&res=medium[/img] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg853/scaled.php?server=853&filename=gemscutting.png&res=medium[/img] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg812/scaled.php?server=812&filename=craftingi.png&res=medium[/img] [img]http://a8.sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/308908_1959459509293_1326951647_31764040_4245962_n.jpg[/img]

I have a creeping suspicion that this will fail just like all of the other remakes.

Exactly.

I dont think so.. Im putting alot of effort and time on this project, so Ill do my best [/quote] Still...[/quote] Well see.

Really nice alot of servers are trying to make 317 look like 508+ but what we should being doing is trying to work on a server that is just like runescape. except it’ll be with faster exp rates

item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

ollie123:

I have a creeping suspicion that this will fail just like all of the other remakes.

I dont know, I cant actually say nothing atm.
Its going to be harder to work on this one because Im the only one working, but I love to see something finished on my server, I love the feeling when I get something done, and I want get this server like RS was once.

Read full topic
